MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 Broughall area of Whitchurch. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of repairs required to a grounded overhead line near Myrtle Cottage substation and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:50am on 1st December 2020.
